dict.string: Andernet Posture uses your camera to capture and analyze your posture and gait using advanced body tracking technology. This helps us provide personalized insights and clinical assessments.

We need access to your health data (age, biological sex, height, and weight) to provide personalized posture analysis and compare your metrics against clinical norms appropriate for your demographics.
We'd like to save your gait speed, balance metrics, and movement quality data to the Health app so you can track your progress over time and share it with healthcare providers.
Motion sensors help us analyze your movement patterns, detect balance issues, and assess fall risk during gait analysis sessions.
Save session captures and analysis results to your photo library for your records or to share with healthcare providers.
